# CA Intermediate - Group II

Complete your **Intermediate level**.

- **Paper 7** - EIS & SM
- **Paper 8** - FM & Economics

slides.title: Consolidation
slides.content:
# Group Accounts

## Consolidation

```
Parent + Subsidiary accounts
Eliminate intercompany
NCI and goodwill
```

## Key Adjustments

| Item | Treatment |
|------|----------|
| Investment | Eliminate |
| Intercompany | Cancel |
| Unrealized profit | Remove |
| Goodwill | Calculate |
| NCI | Recognize |
